translations: n．伐木工人：从事砍伐树木的人。
· The fellers are working in the forest.
伐木工人正在森林里工作。

sentences.sentence: Now, just remember your old Pal, Bluto, at the polls today, fellers! And take an extra cigar for each and every vote you give me. Yes, Sir!
sentences.translation: 现在，今天在投票站只要记住你们的老朋友布鲁托，小伙子们！每次你投我一票以及所有投我的票都能得到一支额外的雪茄。是的，先生！
